sentences.en: " That, " answered Scarlett, pointing at the fluffy mass of green flowered muslin.
sentences.cn: " 那件, " 思嘉答道, 一面指着那团蓬乱的绿布花.

sentences.en: Add in sugar syrup and continue beating until fluffy.
sentences.cn: 加入糖浆继续搅打至蓬松.

sentences.en: Beat together the butter and granulated sugar until light and fluffy.
sentences.cn: 把黄油和砂糖搅拌到蓬松发白.

sentences.en: Can I come over tomorrow and pick up Fluffy Meowington's cat toys?
sentences.cn: 好吧,那我明天可不可以过来拿喵喵膨膨的猫玩具?

sentences.en: Cream butter and sugar together until light and fluffy.
sentences.cn: 乳酪奶油和糖一起直到光和毛绒绒的.

sentences.en: Cream the butter and icing sugar together until light and fluffy.
sentences.cn: 把黃油和糖粉放在一起搅成轻软的糊状.

sentences.en: Cream the butter and sugar until the mixture is light and fluffy.
sentences.cn: 搅拌黄油和糖，直到混合物变得松软。

sentences.en: Cream together the margarine and sugar with a wooden spoon until light and fluffy.
sentences.cn: 用一只木勺把人造黄油和糖搅拌成稀松的糊状。

sentences.en: Fluffy clouds are scattered across the pale blue sky.
sentences.cn: 懒散的白云在淡蓝色的天空飘荡.

sentences.en: Fluffy spray allows your styling as a queen all day along.
sentences.cn: 蓬松喷雾让您一天里的造型都犹如皇后般.

sentences.en: It's a very fluffy kind of wool.
sentences.cn: 这种羊毛质地非常柔软。

sentences.en: Newly hatched chicks are like fluffy balls.
sentences.cn: 刚孵出的小鸡像绒毛球.

sentences.en: Peter sampled the fluffy absintle Suissesse.
sentences.cn: 彼得尝了尝起泡的瑞士苦艾酒.

sentences.en: She was a little fluffy baby duck which we reared until she was fully grown.
sentences.cn: 它那时还是只毛茸茸的小母鸭，我们一直把它养到羽翼丰满。

sentences.en: The steamed bread is very fluffy.

words.tran_cn: 绒毛；错误；无价值的东西

trans.tran_cn: 松软的，毛茸茸的，轻柔的，无聊的，琐碎的，肤浅的
trans.tran_en: food that is fluffy is made soft and light by mixing it quickly so that a lot of air is mixed into it
